data.title: Founder Katsuhiko features in Newsweek Magazine
data.meta_site_name: HARDLOCK Official | Lead manufacturer of self-locking nuts
data.text:
HARDLOCK Industry Co., Ltd and it’s visionary founder, Katsuhiko Wakabayashi, were recently featured in Newsweek Magazine!

HARDLOCK Industry and Founder Featured in Newsweek Magazine!

At HARDLOCK, we firmly believe that overseas partnerships are the key to overcoming challenges and enhancing our global presence. Mr. Wakabayashi emphasizes the importance of collaborating with local partners to jointly expand the market and create a secure and sustainable society, with a special focus on supporting infrastructure development.

Our chairman’s vision is to eradicate any issues caused by bolt loosening, and we’re achieving this by forging strong alliances with like-minded companies who share HARDLOCK’s goals. Our aim is to provide safe and reliable bolted joint mechanisms for international society. It’s not just about maximizing profits for our company; we think globally and seek ways to contribute and support society as a whole.

In the next five years, we envision the establishment of a revolutionary high-tensile resin fastener mechanism that will transform the worldwide industry. Within this framework, our commitment to global contribution remains unwavering.
